name: Asad Rauf
label: Data Analytics Engineer
summary: Senior Analytics Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable data solutions. Skilled in SQL, dbt, BigQuery, and Airflow. Focused on enabling data-driven growth through clean, reliable infrastructure.

work_experience.position: Senior Analytics Engineer / Data Engineer / Senior Data Engineering Specialist
work_experience.summary: Designed, built, and maintained robust and scalable data marts/models, established data governance standards, optimized performance of data pipelines, and collaborated with various stakeholders to deliver impactful data solutions.
highlights: Designed, built, and maintained robust and scalable data marts/models to support complex analyses.
Established and enforced data quality standards with validation checks and documented data lineage.
Defined key business metrics and ensured their consistent calculation across the organization.
Developed documentation and self-serve tools to empower analysts in data access and usage.
Monitored and optimized data pipelines and queries for performance efficiency.
Collaborated closely with product teams, data engineers, analysts, and business stakeholders.

work_experience.summary: Led GCP migration to reporting layer, optimized dbt models, developed data pipelines, maintained schema integrity, and conducted code reviews to uphold engineering standards.
highlights: Led the migration of country project in GCP to the reporting layer using dbt and Airflow.
Converted full-load models into incremental models to optimize performance and reduce costs.
Gathered and documented data requirements across cross-functional teams.
Developed robust data pipelines to enable efficient table movement into the data warehouse.
Maintained downstream model integrity by incorporating upstream schema updates.
Conducted code reviews on GitHub to ensure best practices and project standards.

work_experience.summary: Managed and mentored junior analysts, optimized SQL performance, developed revenue simulations, and led data-driven projects to improve key operational KPIs.
highlights: Managed and mentored a team of junior analysts, enhancing team productivity.
Optimized SQL queries, achieving 0% downtime for critical Tableau dashboards.
Developed simulations in Python to optimize delivery fees and increase revenue per order.
Led data and automation projects for operational efficiency and insight generation.
Improved KPIs like revenue per order and basket size through market basket analysis.
Automated commission calculations for the commercial team, saving manual hours.

work_experience.summary: Conducted academic data analysis, automated reports, and provided strategic insights through nationwide survey analysis to support education policies.
highlights: Performed exploratory data analysis to support strategic decision-making.
Designed, analyzed, and reported on nationwide surveys.
Automated academic reports using Power BI, saving significant manual effort.
Analyzed student performance data to guide subject selection for A Level exams.

work_experience.summary: Managed examination operations for 38 branches, led a team of 20 officers, introduced data-driven reporting practices, and collaborated on academic reporting software development.
highlights: Managed examination operations for 38 branches across the central region.
Led a team of 20 examination officers, ensuring operational excellence.
Introduced data analysis trends and spearheaded key reporting initiatives.
Implemented Power BI dashboards to support data-driven decision-making.
Collaborated with IT to develop local academic reporting software.

projects.title: My First Project
projects.summary: I will be adding some Analytics Engineering projects soon.
highlights: Analytics Engineering Project

degrees: BSc. Honors in Economics and Politics (Joint Major)
